content: (First Author) Paper [COCO-O: A Benchmark for Object Detectors under Natural Distribution Shifts](https://arxiv.org/abs/2307.12730) was accepted by ICCV 2023!!
Our Research Project [EasyRobust](https://github.com/alibaba/easyrobust) wins the 2023 IEEE Open Source Science Awards!!
(First Author) Paper [Enhance the Visual Representation via Discrete Adversarial Training](https://arxiv.org/abs/2209.07735) was accepted by NeurIPS 2022!
